statement.p: Out of the last 41 days, it rained 10 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{10}}{{41}}={0.24390243902439}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.24390243902439}={24.390243902439} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 24.39 .
